headline: Mercer Reveals Average Salary in China Set to Increase by 4% in 2026
summary: SHANGHAI, October 29, 2025--Mercer, a business of Marsh McLennan (NYSE: MMC) and a global leader in helping clients realize their investment objectives, shape the future of work and enhance health and retirement outcomes for their people, today revealed that the average employee salary in China is projected to rise to 4.0% in 2026, up from an actual 3.8% in 2025.

content.title: Mercer Reveals Average Salary in China Set to Increase by 4% in 2026
content.summary: SHANGHAI, October 29, 2025--Mercer, a business of Marsh McLennan (NYSE: MMC) and a global leader in helping clients realize their investment objectives, shape the future of work and enhance health and retirement outcomes for their people, today revealed that the average employee salary in China is projected to rise to 4.0% in 2026, up from an actual 3.8% in 2025.
